refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the Modelica directory path needed by Xcos diagram containing Modelica blocks

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function is used to know where are the Modelica files used to define Xcos Modelica blocks.

If the user want to define his own Modelica blocks, he has to indicate where are the Modelica files describing the blocks. The variable %MODELICA_PATH has to be declared in the Scilab console before launching xcos.

listitem.para: modelica_path : a string given the current path of the Modelica directory containing the defining blocks Modelica files.
modelica_directory : a string given the name of the Modelica directory.
